channel.title: Castles - E/E [Drum & Bass, Strings, Future Bass]
channel.description:
https://soundcloud.com/eslashe/castles
Been a while since my last song, but I'm proud to present my latest effort into Drum & Bass, Castles. With a little future bass wubs to add some spice into the mix. Feedback is definitely appreciated ^w^
![CastlesIcon|500x500](upload://uYgHGNixvRMWSME4YVyymjMQaWo.png)

item.description:
I’ll definitely take a look at it, I just really want to learn how to mix myself as it’s something that will help me in the long run

item.source: Castles - E/E [Drum & Bass, Strings, Future Bass]

item.title: Castles - E/E [Drum & Bass, Strings, Future Bass]
item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
AnirudhKhanna:

I rlly like it! I like the beat pattern and tempo. One suggestion is to add a little more bass. But nonetheless it was a very good piece

Argh I knew it was missing something. Oh well, it’s not meant to be too bass heavy anyway.

AnirudhKhanna:

Good wubz

I get that a lot for some reason despite barely using wubs xD

anon73773654:

Nice job! I really like the originality of the track, and the chords are pretty cool too.

I would recommend increasing the volume of some of the instruments, especially the drums. And the wubs are nice, but I’m not sure they entirely fit.

Good track overall though.

Thanks! The reason why it’s a bit quiet is because I mixed it using FL studio and made sure it was not clipping/distorting/etc. Probably could have adjusted a few of the instruments a bit better but I’m still just trying to get used to working with different software.

Read full topic

Good track overall though.
